itunes:summary:
The Drinkin' Bros Sports Companion Show has moved to a new channel, check us out here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/drinkin-bros-sports/id1541539473

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the College Football National Championship Game between Alabama and Ohio State including the how healthy Justin Fields is, Ohio State being an underdog at +8, if Nick Saban would retire after another championship, whether the game is going to be postponed because of COVID, and Natty prep bets — plus they break down Nick Saban’s daughter’s sh*t talking tweet to Ohio State.

Presented by ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
